column4: Hello! I just have a small question, more of an annoyance than a problem. My trash bin says there is 1 item in trash but there is absolutely nothing in it. Anyone have any idea why? It started happening after my upgrade to 8.10 (on 64-bit).
mm.. I get that too.. at the moment I have 2 items.. I just wish it would trust me to tell it when it's empty
I haven't found any solutions apart from removing the applet and adding it again
hehe.. actually I haven't searched in launchpad.. can't really say I've tried finding out why it behaves the way it does.. but removing it and adding it again fixes it for me
